empty.heading: No languages configured
empty.description: Please configure Markets and languages in Shopify admin first.

overview.title: Language Capacity
overview.slotsAvailable: You have slots available to publish directly to Shopify.
overview.slotsFull: Shopify limit reached. New languages will be created as Drafts.

settings.title: Link conversion
settings.desc: Automatically convert internal links to the target language URLs when translating.
settings.help: Automatically convert internal links to the target language URL during translation.
settings.conservativeHelp: Only convert clearly matched domains and paths.
settings.aggressiveHelp: Convert more links; may convert external links.

table.emptyFlatDesc: Refresh to sync the latest language list from Shopify.

drafts.title: Staging Queue (Drafts)
drafts.warning: Draft languages are invisible to customers. To publish a draft, you must first unpublish an active language in Shopify Admin.
drafts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this draft?
drafts.limitReached: Shopify language limit reached. This language will be created as a Draft and will NOT be visible on your store until you make space for it.
drafts.seoWarning: Warning: Frequent swapping of published languages can negatively impact your SEO rankings.
